about.title: Trusted Actuarial Expertise Since 2010
about.description1: KKA VAB provides high-quality actuarial services to help businesses navigate complex insurance companies, employee welfare benefits, retirement funds and health warranty and actuary training. With over 20 years of experience, our team of certified actuaries delivers tailored solutions that drive strategic decision-making and financial stability.
about.description2: Our deep industry knowledge, analytical rigor, and commitment to excellence have made us the trusted partner for leading insurance companies, employee welfare benefits, retirement funds and health warranty and actuary training across Asia.

publicActuary.name: V. Agus Basuki FSAI
publicActuary.bio: Agus Basuki is the company leader and public actuary who has experience in the actuarial field of expertise in pension  and post-employment benefits programs since 2007. He has a bachelor's degree in ITB Mathematics and has held the title of Fellow of the Society of Actuaries of Indonesia since 2016.

seniorCons.name: Albert Charles Sompie, SE
seniorCons.bio: Albert is a senior consultant who has joined us since 2017 and has experience in the field of pension program, life insurance and post-employment benefits programs for more than 20 years at the Central Actuarial Bureau. He assists clients in the field of post-employment benefits consultation (PSAK 24).

lifeIns.name: Serarindramulia, SE FSAI
lifeIns.bio: Rarindra is a life insurance expert who has experience in the actuarial field for more than 20 years in several joint venture life insurance companies in Jakarta and Singapore, including Sun Life Finance and Swiss Re Singapore. He has a bachelor's degree in extension economics and an actuarial diploma from the University of Indonesia and has held the title of Fellow of the Society of Actuaries of Indonesia since 2011.

it.name: Arya Ananggadipa Augusta, SKOM
it.bio: Arya is our IT support Expert Arya who graduated from Universitas Bina Nusantara.

acc.name: Rachel, SE
acc.bio: Rachel has the expertise in Accounting, Finance, and Tax, who graduated From Universitas Trisakti.

tele.name: Skolastika Asclepias
tele.bio: Ascle is our specialist in Telemarketing who graduated from Universitas Bina Nusantara.

admin.name: Jonathan, SE
admin.bio: Jonathan handles our administration and he graduated from Universitas Diponegoro.

about.title: About KKA VAB
about.description: Building financial resilience through expert actuarial analysis and strategic consulting.
about.storyDesc1: Actuary Consultant Office V. Agus Basuki or Kantor Konsultan Aktuaria V. Agus Basuki (KKA VAB) is a company that enganges in actuary services, such as post-employment benefit program, insurance and retiremend funds. It is led by V. Agus Basuki, FSAI with the following actuary license.
about.storyDesc2: Ministry of Finance of Republic Indonesia No. 738/KM.1/2018 dated on November 28th, 2018 and Public Actuary License: Act-1.18.00135.
about.storyDesc3: Certificate of registration in OJK : Actuarial Consultant for the Non-Bank Financial Industry No. 035/NB.122/STTD-KA/2021 dated on March 9th, 2021.
about.storyDesc4: We have previously worked on post-employment benefit program since 2010 with PT Lastika Dipa and continue to provide our serviice as KKA VAB on October 24th, 2019.
about.vision: To be the preeminent actuarial consultancy in Asia, recognized for our technical excellence, innovative solutions, and unwavering commitment to our clients' success.
about.mission: To empower organizations to make informed financial decisions through expert actuarial analysis, strategic consulting, and innovative solutions that drive sustainable growth and create lasting value for our clients and communities.

coreValue.title: Our Core Values
coreValue.description1: Delivering the highest quality in every aspect of our work
coreValue.description2: Maintaining unwavering honesty and ethical standards
coreValue.description3: Continuously improving our methods and approaches
coreValue.description4: Working closely with clients to achieve their goals

team.title: Meet Our Expert Team
team.description: Our diverse team of certified actuaries and financial experts brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to every client engagement.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive actuarial solutions tailored to the unique needs of your organization

overview.title: Actuarial Excellence at Your Service
overview.description: Our team of expert actuaries provides a comprehensive range of services designed to help your organization navigate complex financial challenges and seize opportunities.

insurance.title: Insurance Consulting
insurance.description: Assist the preparation of Filing for Life Insurance and General Insurance New Products. Re-checking the formulas and assumptions used for Life, General, & Health Insurance products, calculation and validation of Premium Reserves for life and general insurance companies, calculation of claim reserves, UPR, and URR for Life, General and Health Insurance, Calculation of Motor Vehicle Rates based on the previous company claims. Other services required according to the needs of each service user, including a second opinion from an Actuary which may be needed as a comparison.
insurance.keyBenefit1: Product Filing Support – Assistance in preparing Life and General Insurance new product filings.
insurance.keyBenefit2: Technical Accuracy – Review of formulas and assumptions to ensure compliance and soundness.
insurance.keyBenefit3: Reserve Validation – Accurate calculation of premium, claim, UPR, and URR reserves.
insurance.keyBenefit4: Rates Analysis – Motor vehicle rates calculation based on historical claims data.
insurance.keyBenefit5: Technical Accuracy – Review of formulas and assumptions to ensure compliance and soundness.

retirement.title: Retirement Funds and Health Warranty
retirement.description: Assist in the preparation and establishment of Pension Funds as well as the dissolution of Pension Funds (DPPK & DPLK). Calculation and illustration of health program costs for active participants and retirees. Retirement fund valuation and simulation of retirement benefit calculations; study of employee’s health Insurance to get the best option for the Company including funding, institutional and operational implementation of health insurance.
retirement.keyBenefit1: End-to-End Pension Fund Support – Assistance in setting up or dissolving DPPK & DPLK schemes.
retirement.keyBenefit2: Health Cost Forecasting – Cost estimation for healthcare programs for employees and retirees.
retirement.keyBenefit3: Retirement Benefit Simulation – Accurate valuation and projection of employee retirement benefits.
retirement.keyBenefit4: Health Insurance Optimization – Evaluation to select the most effective health insurance solution.
retirement.keyBenefit5: Comprehensive Implementation – Guidance on funding, structure, and operations of health programs.

welfare.title: Employee Welfare Benefits
welfare.description: Calculate the estimation of Defined Benefit Liabilities and Expenses based on the provisions of employee benefit accounting standards for the requested period alongside the company policy, Employment Law No. 13 of 2003, and other regulations applicable to the company to comply the financial reports based on PSAK-24 (Employee Benefits), International Accounting Standards (IAS) and other Accounting Standards, including SAK ETAP.
welfare.keyBenefit1: Regulatory Compliance – Aligned with PSAK 24, IAS, and Employment Law No. 13/2003.
welfare.keyBenefit2: Accurate Financial Reporting – Ensures proper recognition of employee benefit liabilities and expenses.
welfare.keyBenefit3: Legal Risk Mitigation – Complies with legal obligations to employees under applicable laws.
welfare.keyBenefit4: Better Financial Planning – Provides a reliable basis for long-term budgeting and projections.
welfare.keyBenefit5: Stakeholder Transparency – Enhances trust from investors and auditors through reliable disclosures.

workshop.title: Actuary Training
workshop.description: Facilitate the preparations for taking the Actuary professional exam by providing training regarding Retirement fund calculations, PSAK-24, and knowledge regarding the calculation of technical reserves for life insurance companies and general insurance, as well as training for non actuarial resources.
workshop.keyBenefit1: Exam Readiness – Support for Actuary exam preparation through focused training.
workshop.keyBenefit2: Practical Skills – Training in retirement fund calculations and PSAK-24 applications.
workshop.keyBenefit3: Technical Mastery – Deepened understanding of technical reserve calculations for insurance.
workshop.keyBenefit4: Inclusive Training – Programs available for both actuarial and non-actuarial staff.
workshop.keyBenefit5: Professional Development – Enhances competencies relevant to insurance and pensions sectors.

process.title: Our Consulting Process
process.description: We follow a structured yet flexible approach to ensure we deliver solutions that precisely meet your needs

step1.name: Step 1
step1.title: Discovery & Analysis
step1.description: We begin by thoroughly understanding your organization's unique needs, challenges, and objectives through in-depth consultations and data analysis.

step2.name: Step 2
step2.title: Strategy Development
step2.description: Our expert actuaries design tailored solutions and strategies based on rigorous analysis and industry best practices.

step3.name: Step 3
step3.title: Implementation
step3.description: We work closely with your team to implement solutions efficiently, providing clear guidance and support throughout the process.

step4.name: Step 4
step4.title: Ongoing Support & Optimization
step4.description: We provide continuous monitoring, periodic reviews, and ongoing optimization to ensure long-term success and adaptation to changing circumstances.
